programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Dusk Til Dawn in Punta Cana
programme.desc: John Duthie and the regulars from the Dusk Til Dawn game in London take to the beaches of Punta Cana where they are ambushed by Michael Chi Zhang. Featuring John Duthie, Michael Chi Zhang, Justin Sevilla, Timothy Chung, Luke Marsh and Vish Maini.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: Dusk Til Dawn in Punta Cana 2
programme.desc: Shaun Deeb joins the Dusk Til Dawn crew for some fish & chips and bad beats. Michael Chi Zhang continues to crush. Featuring John Duthie, Michael Chi Zhang, Justin Sevilla, Timothy Chung, Shawn Deeb and Vish Maini.

programme.desc: King of the Hill Part 1: Heads-Up double shoot-out featuring Phil Hellmuth, Doug Polk, Daniel 'Jungleman' Cates & Frank Kasella. Each has put up $50,000 and only one will leave with $200,000 and the belt!

programme.sub-title: A New York Kind Of Shove
programme.desc: We bring you the action from our first $25/50 full ring cash game from Rivers Casino & Resort in Schenectady, NY. Featuring Phil Hellmuth, Doug Polk, Ashley Deeb, Shaun Deeb, Frank Kassela, Paul DiMascio, Matt Montesi, Joe Rice, Fred Bartlett, Todd Dugan, Brandon Lamora, and Michael Babbitt.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The $25/50 cash game from our first visit to Rivers Casino & Resort in Schenectady, NY continues into the evening as locals square off against traveling pros. Featuring Doug Polk, Shaun Deeb, Frank Kassela, Matt Montesi, Fred Bartlett, Todd Dugan, Rajiv Maragh, and Brandon Lamora.
